Every shopper innocently bumping into him got automatically stabbed once and when panic ensued, the death count soared to ridiculous numbers. For stayed hands are antinomic to the Little Revenger, the dagger which strikes back so fast as to be unseen.

GameModifier.Provides: Little Revenger effect- Enemies that strike the wielder suffer two retaliating strikes
